OTE: The question corresponding to CANCERYR was skipped if respondents reported first being diagnosed with any form of cancer at their

column1: current age because it could be logically inferred that they had cancer in the past year.
<s>Did you have cancer during the past 12 months?</s>

column2: Len : 2    HAD ANY CANCER PAST 12 MONTHS
OTE: The variables HRTCONDAG, DIABETEAG, COPDAGE, CIRROSAGE, HEPBAGE, KIDNYDSAG, ASTHMAAGE, HIVAIDSAG, and
HIGHBPAGE represent the ages when specific health conditions other than cancer were first diagnosed. Beginning in 2016, the questions
instructed respondents to enter 1 if they were diagnosed before they were 1 year old. In 2016, however, respondents were still allowed to enter 0 for

column1: the age when they were first diagnosed. Beginning in 2017, a response of 0 is no longer allowed.
H<s>ow old were you when your heart condition or heart disease was first diagnosed?</s>
